mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( user_id, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_email, user_nickname, user_level, user_create_at, drawn_user ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{nickname}, 'N', SYSDATE, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT user_num as userNum, user_id as userId, user_password as userPw, user_name as userName, user_nickname as userNickname, user_email as userEmail, user_level as userLevel FROM USERS WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_password = #{password}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_email = #{email}
SELECT user_id as userId FROM USERS WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND user_email = #{userEmail}
SELECT user_num as userNum, user_id as userId, user_password as userPw, user_name as userName, user_nickname as userNickname, user_email as userEmail FROM USERS WHERE user_email = #{email}

SELECT user_num AS userNum, user_id AS userId, user_password AS userPassword, user_name AS userName, user_phone AS userPhone, user_email AS userEmail, user_nickname AS userNickname, user_image AS userImage, user_banner AS userBanner, drawn_user AS drawnUser, user_create_at AS userCreateAt, user_level AS userLevel FROM USERS WHERE user_num = #{userNum}
